channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: RFK Jr.'s picks for CDC vaccine advisers meet this week amid controversy
item.description: For the first time since Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. replaced all the members of the vaccine committee, it is meeting in Atlanta.

item.title: Trump doubles down on damage U.S. strikes caused to Iran's nuclear sites
item.description: President Trump spoke at the conclusion of the summit in the Netherlands — as the world watches to see whether a ceasefire between Israel and Iran wil...

item.title: Brutal Temperatures Expected for Many on Wednesday, but Relief Is Near
item.description: After days of record-breaking heat, some cooling is expected in the Eastern United States starting Thursday.

item.title: Greetings from Odesa, Ukraine, where a Black Sea beach offers respite from war
item.description: Far-Flung Postcards is a weekly series in which NPR's international team shares snapshots of moments from their lives and work around the world.

item.title: Kennedy Withdraws Funding Pledge to International Vaccine Agency
item.description: Robert F. Kennedy Jr. claimed that Gavi had “ignored the science” in immunizing children around the world.

item.title: Israel was once deterred from striking Iran. Now Netanyahu takes a victory lap
item.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu wanted to attack Iran for decades, but the U.S. and his own security chiefs deterred him. Now he's basking i...

item.title: U.K. Says It’s Buying 12 Jets That Can Carry Nuclear Weapons
item.description: The decision means that Britain’s air force will have a nuclear role for the first time since the end of the Cold War.

item.title: Iran's nuclear program set back 'a few months.' And, Trump to meet with NATO allies
item.description: An early assessment by the Defense Intelligence Agency believes the damage to Iran's most important nuclear site was limited. And, Trump will meet wit...

item.title: Inside a Last-Ditch Battle to Save (or Kill) Clean-Energy Tax Credits
item.description: Supporters of tax breaks for wind and solar are fighting to retain them in the G.O.P. tax bill. They’re facing a conservative effort to kill them enti...

item.title: How a Birthday Boat Ride on Lake Tahoe Turned Tragic
item.description: Eight people died when a surprise storm caused dangerous waves on the lake along the California-Nevada border, upending boats and tossing passengers i...

item.title: Live Updates: Trump Officials Push Back Against U.S. Report on Iran’s Nuclear Program
item.description: As the cease-fire between Israel and Iran entered a second day, the Trump administration contradicted a preliminary, classified U.S. intelligence repo...

item.title: Rubio Fleshes Out Trump’s Case That Iran Nuclear Capacity Was Eliminated
item.description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio said U.S. strikes had destroyed a facility that is key to producing a nuclear weapon. He railed against a less optimist...

item.title: Eurostar Trains Delayed and Canceled After Cable Theft
item.description: The company running the passenger service between Britain and continental Europe advised travelers to “cancel or postpone.”

item.title: Vietnam Abolishes Death Penalty for Embezzlement and Other Crimes
item.description: The move, one official said, would help the country extradite suspects from abroad. It would also spare the life of a recently convicted tycoon.

item.title: Kennedy Withdraws Funding Pledge to International Vaccine Agency
item.description: In a video address, the health secretary said the United States would no longer donate to Gavi, the vaccine agency. The organization rejected his clai...
